price: 4. Moominiiney isin korosuk xagana kah culten maray sarra woo xaganak tu makeweeh Aggileweey sin naqboytiitik numtin Qaxat gaceweeh keenik num Qokle wee mara akke waytek, tokkel ken xagana keenih duudusa keenih xagten waktî fanah, diggah Yalli isik meesita maray xagana duudusa kicnih.
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ عَٰهَدتُّم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ ثُمَّ لَمۡ يَنقُصُوكُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَمۡ يُظَٰهِرُواْ عَلَيۡكُمۡ أَحَدٗا فَأَتِمُّوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِمۡ عَهۡدَهُمۡ إِلَىٰ مُدَّتِهِمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna ʿāhadttum mina al-mush'rikīna thumma lam yanquṣūkum shayan walam yuẓāhirū ʿalaykum aḥadan fa-atimmū ilayhim ʿahdahum ilā muddatihim inna al-laha yuḥibbu al-mutaqīna
